title: Rotating text: letters are jumping
body:
### Description
I was trying to make an animation of text rotation.
Unfortunately the letters are swimming / jumping.

I've asked about it in skia-discuss forum, they said I was missing to set the SubpixelText.
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/skia-discuss/XckcdV-wCh8

After doing so in SkiaSharp, the letters are still jumping.
Is it an issue or am I missing something or doing something wrong?

### Code

Skia fiddle (text is smooth, subpixeltext is on):
https://fiddle.skia.org/c/361c252ed2a32078737ae94c97511e45

### Expected Behavior
Smooth rotation of the letters
### Actual Behavior
Letters are swimming (jumping), see the gif.
### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.3
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Windows Classic:  Windows 10

### Screenshots
